mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM plat_bank_account a
AND a.bank_account LIKE '%'||#{bankAccount}||'%' '%'+#{bankAccount}+'%' concat('%',#{bankAccount},'%')
AND a.bank_account_name LIKE '%'||#{bankAccountName}||'%' '%'+#{bankAccountName}+'%' concat('%',#{bankAccountName},'%')
AND a.bank_name LIKE '%'||#{bankName}||'%' '%'+#{bankName}+'%' concat('%',#{bankName},'%')
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plat_bank_account( id, bank_account, bank_account_name, bank_name, title, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{bankAccount}, #{bankAccountName}, #{bankName}, #{title}, #{createDate} )
